text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Om nom nom....

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sitting down at the restaurant, I watch<n>in awe as Tosen
Jordan shoves<n>hamburger after hamburger into her<n>
mouth. I'm not even sure she's<n>chewing...
choice_data_list: You like hamburgers, huh?
You like hamburgers, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Mmm, I guess so? My parents aretotal health nuts, so I was neverallowed to eat much junk food as akid. But it just hits different, yaknow?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You're a trainer, right? Aren't you<n>gonna stop me? This
doesn't exactly<n>scream "what I eat in a day as a<n>racer."
choice_data_list: Eating like this is fine every once in a while.
Eating like this is fine every once in a while.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hm... Weirdo.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Phew... I really went hard on those<n>burgers! Anyway, thanks
for the meal,<n>and see you 'round.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just like I promised, we ended up<n>only eating together.
While I'd like to<n>get to the bottom of her problems, I<n>also
don't want to force her to talk.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I watch her walk away, I swear to<n>myself that next time,
I'll get her to<n>open up to me.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Sigh... You're a weird one, youknow that? I literally have no ideawhat's going on in that head ofyours.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: You know... I think my toenails are<n>low-key cursed.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I got injured right after<n>entering the academy. And
guess<n>what? As soon as I got back,<n>everyone else was
waaay better than<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Just two morelaps—no, four more! I have to keepgoin—ow!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: You'd be scared, right? You'd goharder in practice, right? Well, I did,and guess what? I got hurt again! So Itake a break, and then I'm evenfarther behind!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: And everyone in my class is alreadysooo much better than me. I'msick of being a cringey loser all thetime, but that's what's happening...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
And I'm just... sick of it all. Guess<n>that means Teach is
right. I've lost my<n>motivation.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I look down as I contemplate her<n>words. It's true that
Jordan's attitude<n>screams unmotivated, but her actions<n>
say otherwise.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: If it weren't for my stupid flimsy toe,<n>maybe I—ugh. Forget it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She may have been complaining, but<n>the way she was
carefully massaging<n>her toe showed how much she<n>
wanted it to heal. That didn't seem<n>unmotivated to me.
choice_data_list: Do you really believe that?
Do you really believe that?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Didn't you see me run in the last<n>scrimmage? When I tried
to run,<n>something just... happened, and I<n>don't know why.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Everyone said it looked like I wasn't<n>even trying. And if
that's how they all<n>see it, maybe they're ri—
choice_data_list: You looked like you were trying to me.
You looked like you were trying to me.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: Weren't you?
Weren't you?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Yeah... I was. I mean, I thought Iwas. B-but, like... can I really trustmyself to know?
choice_data_list: Why wouldn't you?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I've never been... very good at<n>studying. Or, like, most
things really.<n>And I've got a real nasty temper, so<n>I'd
always get in fights. I'm just...<n>worthless.
choice_data_list: What about races?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I... like racing.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean... winning is the vibe.Straight up goals. That's the only timeanyone's ever called anything I doamazing.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Racing's... the only thing I've got.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean, this is Tracen, right? Theyshould be able to turn even meinto a star.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: That's why I wanted to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I nod. It seems she's finally speaking<n>from the heart.
choice_data_list: Do you still want to?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Y-yes...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: B-but I don't want to lose, either!I already feel like a loser, and comingin last again would just make itworse.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
A-all I've got going for me is racing,<n>but now I just keep
losing, and losing,<n>and losing!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: If it turns out I suck at racing too, thenwhat the hell am I good for?!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I WANT to win! I want to win lotsand lots and LOTS of races! I'msick of people sleeping on me! I wantto make 'em all eat their words!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: But I don't know HOW! Andwhen I picture running like I did in thescrimmage again, I can't take it! Idon't wanna race if I'm gonna be acringey loser!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
And seeing everyone else try so hard<n>just made me feel
even worse, so I<n>started skipping. I know that's not<n>
gonna help me win, but I—
choice_data_list: What if we trained together?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her desire to win is so great that<n>she's deathly afraid of
losing... There<n>aren't a lot of Umamusume with such<n>
strong feelings.
choice_data_list:
That desire to win is going to be your greatest
weapon.

That desire to win is going to be your greatest
weapon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When it comes down to the final<n>stretch, and two racers are
fighting for<n>first place, the winner isn't<n>determined by skill,
but by who wants<n>to win more.
choice_data_list: I'd hate to see someone like you give up.
I'd hate to see someone like you give up.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
C-come on, it's not—anyway, what's<n>the point if I can't
even run the way I<n>want to?
choice_data_list: That only happened because you were scared.
That only happened because you were scared.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fear can do strange things to the<n>body—mess with
breathing, even lead<n>to anemia. No doubt that's what<n>
happened at the scrimmage.
choice_data_list:
If you went into a race confidently, I bet you'd
win.

If you went into a race confidently, I bet you'd
win.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Really?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
N-no way. Everyone's already so far<n>ahead of me. And
what about my<n>weird toe? If I got hurt again, I'd—
choice_data_list: Relax. Let me worry about that.
Relax. Let me worry about that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I reassure her that at this point, she's<n>only missed a little
training. Nothing a<n>little hard work can't fix. I can also<n>
create a training regimen with her<n>toenail in mind.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You really are a weirdo, you know<n>that? You're not even my
trainer, so<n>why? Why go so far for me?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Still... I dunno why, but...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Something about this... is giving mewinner energy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The cold, hard walls Tosen Jordan<n>built around herself melt
away in that<n>instant, revealing a mischievous<n>smirk and a
red-hot sparkle in her<n>eyes.
